name: PopPop-HD
description:
PopPop -- Elimination Blasting Games

It's shape and other things popping time! Ur goal in this puzzler is to eliminate the same objects that have an unobstructed view of where u click. U have to click or touch an empty space that has a clear line to two or more of the same objects. If there is another shape blocking the path, then nothing will be removed and u will be one step closer to defeat.

As u progress through the levels...
it will not only be shapes u will be poppping... so be ready for some frooky times.

Wot r u waiting for?
It's time to get rid of some shapes, right?
